@Service @Transactional public class PostService extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • PostService

      public PostService()

  • Method Details

    • getPosts

      public List<Post> getPosts(String cookie, Integer lastNPosts, Integer offset)
      Retrieve a paginated list of posts for an authorized session.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      lastNPosts - how many posts to return (defaults to 10 when null or invalid input: '<'= 0)
      offset - number of posts to skip (defaults to 0 when null or invalid input: '<' 0)
      Returns:
      list of Post DTOs including like/comment counts and whether the current user liked each post
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - when the session is invalid or missing

    • createPost

      public Post createPost(String cookie, Content content)
      Create a new post authored by the account associated with the provided session cookie.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      content - content payload for the new post
      Returns:
      created Post DTO including metadata and like/comment counts
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - when the session is invalid or missing

    • editPost

      public Post editPost(String cookie, UUID postId, Content content)
      Edit an existing post if the requesting account is the author.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      postId - id of the post to edit
      content - new content for the post
      Returns:
      updated Post DTO
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the post cannot be found
      IllegalActionException - when the requesting account is not the author

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(String cookie, UUID postId)
      Delete an existing post authored by the requesting account.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      postId - id of the post to delete
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the post cannot be found
      IllegalActionException - when the requesting account is not the author

    • likePost

      public Post likePost(String cookie, UUID postId)
      Add a like from the current user to the specified post.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      postId - id of the post to like
      Returns:
      Post DTO reflecting the updated like count and whether the current user liked it
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the post cannot be found

    • getPostStats

      public PostStats getPostStats(String cookie, UUID postId)
      Compute stats for a post. Requires a valid session (quick validation).
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      postId - id of the post to compute stats for
      Returns:
      PostStats DTO containing computed stat value
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - when the session cookie is invalid
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the post cannot be found
